related_questions.question:
23. Man : "How does it feel if I press here?”    Woman : "Oh, that hurts."
Man : "I see. You have an appendix. We'll
have an operation immediately."
Which part of her body hurts?

A. Nose
B. Ear
C. Eye
D. Throat
E. Stomach​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

E. Stomach

Penjelasan:

because the womenhave an operation immediately. stomach part

may be useful

Jawaban:

related_questions.question:
B. Complete the sentences below using the past perfect in the negative and the    words provided.
Ex. My house was very dirty when she came over because.... (Il not clean/ for
weeks) My house was very dirty when she came over because I hadn't
cleaned it for weeks.
1. Joe had to study hard for yesterday's test because... (he/not do well/ the week before)
2. I was worried when she didn't arrive on time because... (she/ not be/ late/ before)
3. Judy didn't want to go on the school ski trip because .... (she/not ski/ before)
4. I didn't recognize Ellen at the party because.... (I not/see/ for years)
5. John didn't catch the bus because.... (he/not leave/ the house/ on time​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

Lengkapi kalimat di bawah ini dengan menggunakan past perfect dalam bentuk negatif dan the

kata-kata yang disediakan.

Ex. Rumah saya sangat kotor ketika dia datang karena .... (Saya tidak bersih / untuk

minggu) Rumah saya sangat kotor ketika dia datang karena saya tidak

dibersihkan selama berminggu-minggu.

1. Joe harus belajar keras untuk ujian kemarin karena... (dia/tidak mengerjakannya dengan baik/ minggu sebelumnya)

2. Saya khawatir ketika dia tidak datang tepat waktu karena... (dia/ tidak/ terlambat/ sebelumnya)

3. Judy tidak mau ikut perjalanan ski sekolah karena .... (dia/tidak bermain ski/ sebelumnya)

4. Saya tidak mengenali Ellen di pesta karena.... (Saya tidak/melihat/ selama bertahun-tahun)

5. John tidak naik bus karena.... (dia/tidak berangkat/ rumah/ tepat waktu

Penjelasan:

semoga membantu

be-minded-close-don't-So

young-she-woman-an-is-energetic
wer

related_questions.question:
6. The most distinguishing characteristic of an    elephant is.....
(A). its clumsiness
(B). its thick legs
(C). its large body
(D). its long nose 

artinya....​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

Penjelasan:

Yang paling membedakan dari karakteristik gajah adalah D. hidungnya yang panjang :)

related_questions.question: 3. What is the purpose of retelling a narrative, please explain?​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

The importance of retelling stories is that it allows students to learn to organize and describe events, which enhances reading comprehension.

related_questions.question:
Quiz ;)    Aldo left his favourite restaurant at 11 o’clock. It was warm evening and decided to walk along the beach. Suddenly, four masked girls aged about seventeen came up to …………… and asked for the street.

A. Him
B. Her
C. You
D. Me​

answers.answer:
➡️ A Him

Question

Aldo left his favourite restaurant at 11 o’clock. It was warm evening and decided to walk along the beach. Suddenly, four masked girls aged about seventeen came up to ……and asked for the street.

A. Him

B. Her

C. You

D. Me

Translat

Aldo meninggalkan restoran favoritnya pada pukul 11. Itu adalah malam yang hangat dan memutuskan untuk berjalan di sepanjang pantai. Tiba-tiba, empat gadis bertopeng berusia sekitar tujuh belas datang ke …………… dan meminta jalan.

A. Dia

B. Dia

C. Anda

D. Saya

Answer

A. Him

Explanation

Explain as a pronoun he is male is him, he, .

while the pronoun in female her, she,
